entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McCreary
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
